metadata.description: The action novel written by the popular comedian, Impulse's Toshiyuki Itakura has been made into a comic!  In the near future a new law in Japan is enacted, the "Shoot to kill" law.  So called Triggers are selected, one in each prefecture.  They are allowed to eradicate evil as they see fit.  This edition has the Tokyo, Chiba and the Shizuoka trigger!
metadata.name: TRIGGER
